name: Space Defender
description:
Welcome to space


Space Defender is a top-down 2D arcade space shooter.



Explore space freely and complete the missions you find
on your way.

Combat the menace


Fight off the aliens that are stirring up trouble in the galaxies.



Use a varied arsenal to defeat your enemies.
Laser cannons, automatic turrets, and guided missiles
will be some of your best allies.

Take it to the next level


Travel to 3 different galaxies and help the stations
that will ask for your help.



Earn credits to upgrade your ship, or buy a more powerful one.
Make the right choices to balance your energy consumption.

No time to lose Commander, come join the fight now!
